flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
The cdrom burners have a lot of useful parts the drawer has a nice motor with limits controls useful for things as automated opener, shaker and more.

The tray with read write head has laser diode, and stepper motor that could be reused for small x and y table.
